topic: How to document ETL jobs using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to document ETL jobs using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Documenting ETL Jobs using FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: Learn how to effectively document ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) jobs using the FastAPI framework in Python 3.12+. This guide will provide a step-by-step approach and examples for creating well-structured, maintainable documentation for your data pipelines.
key_points: Understanding the importance of documenting ETL jobs
Introducing FastAPI as a documentation tool
Setting up a FastAPI application for ETL job documentation
Documenting each step of the ETL process (Extract, Transform, Load)
Adding code examples and explanations for each step
Formatting and organizing the documentation for clarity and readability
Leveraging FastAPI features such as OpenAPI and Swagger UI for easy access and exploration of the documentation

code_examples.code:
```python
from fastapi import FastAPI
app = FastAPI()

# Define an endpoint for your ETL job
@app.get('/etl')
def etl():
    # Your ETL job code here
```

version_notes: This guide assumes you have basic knowledge of Python and FastAPI
caveats: Documenting ETL jobs can be time-consuming but is essential for maintaining a clean, maintainable codebase
FastAPI provides powerful tools for documentation, but it may require some learning to get started
Always ensure your documentation is up-to-date with any changes made to the ETL job
